anya-e1207n:18: Tahiṃ, tahiṃ suvitthiṇṇaṃ jinassa caritaṃ hitaṃ;
anya-e1207n:52: Dhanasāraṃ ihaṃ gayha gantuṃ yuttanti me pana.
anya-e1207n:112: Iti taṃ janataṃ pucchi kasmā sodhetha añjasaṃ.
anya-e1207n:124: Iti sotassa so tassa sukhaṃ dento jano’braviṃ.
anya-e1207n:130: Labhitvā visamaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṃ kātuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e1207n:143: Dīgharattāma’laṃ taṃ me hitāya ca sukhāya ca;
anya-e1207n:150: Saṅghassa navako hutvā paviseyyaṃ puraṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1207n:153: Ayaṃ buddho’va’haṃ buddho hutvā loke anuttaro.
anya-e1207n:166: Āgantvāna tahiṃ ṭhānaṃ isiṃ paṅke nipannakaṃ;
anya-e1207n:175: Idaṃ vatvāna katvāna sasaṅgho taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e1207n:191: Kimuddhaṃ vā adho vā’pi disāsu vidisāsu ca.
anya-e1207n:199: Saṃsāre saṃsaranto so bahuṃ dukkhaṃ titikkhiya;
anya-e1207n:212: Kampayitvā mahiṃ dento sute cā’pi sakaṅgatāva.
anya-e1207n:408: Modiṃsu jalajā tasmiṃ jantavo pahasiṃsu ca.
anya-e1207n:444: “Jāto kira mahārāja putto te nuttaro sudhi.
anya-e1207n:457: Phāleyyamuddhā khalu tāpasassa paggayha so añjalimuttamassa;
anya-e1207n:460: Disvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ narindo devātidevassa sakatrajassa;
anya-e1207n:463: Yadā’si rañño puthuvappamaṅgalaṃ tadā puraṃ devapuraṃ’va sajjitaṃ;
anya-e1207n:464: Vibhūsitā tā janatā manoramā samāgatā tassa niketamuttamaṃ.
anya-e1207n:466: Vibhūsitaṅgo janatāhi tāhi so purakkhato bhūsanabhūsitatrajaṃ;
anya-e1207n:470: Sayāpayitvā bahimaṅgalaṃ taṃ udikkhituṃ dhātigaṇā gamiṃsu.
anya-e1207n:473: Nisajja dhīro sayane manuññe’jhānaṃ samāpajji katāvakāso.
anya-e1207n:475: Suvaṇṇabimbaṃ viya taṃ nisinnaṃ chāyañca tassā ṭhitame’va disvā;
anya-e1207n:479: Savandanaṃ me dutiya’nti vatvā puttassa pāde sirasā’bhivandi.
anya-e1207n:514: Sudassanīyaṃ viya nandanaṃ vanaṃ manoramuyyānama’gā mahāyaso.
anya-e1207n:545: Rājentaṃ sataraṃsi’ṃva rājaṃ disvā kathe si’daṃ.
anya-e1207n:547: “Yesaṃ sūnu ayaṃ dhīro yā ca jāyā imassa tu;
anya-e1207n:548: Te sabbe nibbutā nūna sadā’nūnaguṇassa ve”.
anya-e1207n:550: Itī’disaṃ giraṃ sutvā manuññaṃ tāya bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1207n:553: Sītalaṃ vimalaṃ hāriṃ hāraṃ taṃ rativaḍḍhanaṃ;
anya-e1207n:581: So channo patigaṇhitvā taṃ giraṃ tena bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1207n:587: Pattharitvāna gacchantaṃ saddaṃ taṃ sakalaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e1207n:588: Sabbe suragaṇā tasmiṃ sotuṃ nā’daṃsu kassaci.
anya-e1207n:591: Passitvā paṭhamaṃ gantvā pacchā buddho bhavāma’haṃ.
anya-e1207n:611: Samattho assa ko tassā jahituṃ dehasampadaṃ;
anya-e1207n:615: Iti abravi channo so bhūpālassa yasassino.
anya-e1207n:630: Bhaveyya vivaṭaṃ dvāraṃ yena kenaci no sace.
anya-e1207n:639: Tassa cittaṃ viditvāna moditā gamane subhe;
anya-e1207n:645: “Mā nikkhami mahāvīra ito te sattame dine;
anya-e1207n:652: Gaccha tvami’dha mā tiṭṭha na’mhi rajjenamatthiko.
anya-e1207n:679: Itthaṃ tamhi pathe ramme vattamāne mahāmahe;
anya-e1207n:707: Patvā rājagahaṃ dhīro piṇḍāya cari subbato.
anya-e1207n:712: Ko’yaṃ sakko nukho brahmā māro nāgo’tiādinā;
anya-e1207n:719: Tamhā so ākulī katvā gantvā paṇḍavapabbataṃ.
anya-e1207n:731: Dhammaṃ desehi mayhanti buddho hutvā anuttaro.
anya-e1207n:746: Baliṃ dammī’ti gantvāna disvā tā dīpaduttamaṃ.
anya-e1207n:748: Dovo’ti saññāya udaggacittā pāyāsapātiṃ pavarassa datvā;
anya-e1207n:749: “Āsiṃsanā ijjhiyathā hi mayhaṃ tuyhampi sā sāmi samijjhitū’ti.”
anya-e1207n:751: Icce’vaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā gatā tamhā varaṅganā;
anya-e1207n:805: Atha naṃ abbhutaṃ disvā mahāpañño vicintayi.
anya-e1207n:807: “Maṃsalohitamaṭṭhi ca nahārū ca taco ca me;
anya-e1207n:820: Vījayanto ṭhito tattha mandaṃ mandaṃ tigāvutaṃ.
anya-e1207n:832: Vattamāne tadā māro pāpimā iti cintayi.
anya-e1207n:890: Tampi disvā sasoko so gantvā dhīrassa santikaṃ;
anya-e1207n:896: Ko sakkhī’ti pavutto so ime sabbe’ti sakkhino;
anya-e1207n:902: Ko te siddhattha sakkhī’ti atha tenā’tulena’pi;
anya-e1207n:920: Taṃ mārasenaṃ sabhayaṃ sasokaṃ palāyamānaṃ iti devasaṅghā;
anya-e1207n:921: Disvāna mārassa parājayo’yaṃ jayo’ti siddhattha kumārakassa.
anya-e1207n:951: Ñatvā tāsaṃ vitakkaṃ taṃ sametuṃ santamānaso.
anya-e1207n:967: Mūle’pi rājayatanassa tassa tasmiṃ samāpattisukhampi vindaṃ;
anya-e1207n:983: Āsevaṃ takkaṇaṃ dhammaṃ imaṃ me paṭivijjhituṃ.
anya-e1207n:992: Dānaṃ nāma na dinnañca natthi sīlaṃ arakkhitaṃ.
anya-e1207n:998: Chejjādiṃ pāpunattena pāramī natthi kāci me.
anya-e1207n:1001: Na kampittha ayaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ sarato’pi ca.
anya-e1207n:1004: Na kampittha pakampittha pacchime pana yāmake.
anya-e1207n:1025: Nassati vata bho loko iti loko vinassati.
anya-e1207n:1056: Yasassī migadāyamuttamaṃ tahiṃ tapassī atha pañcavaggiyā.
anya-e1207n:1076: Samatthā nahi saṇṭhātuṃ sakāya katikāya te;
anya-e1207n:1190: Atha yodhasahassena tampi pesesi so’pi ca;
anya-e1207n:1226: Suṇitvā madhuraṃ tassa giraṃ lokahite rato;
anya-e1207n:1235: Dine dine vasitvāna yojane yojane jino;
anya-e1207n:1236: Dvīhi māsehi sampatto buddho jātapuraṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1207n:1248: Susajjitaṃ puraṃ patvā munindo taṃ manoramaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1263: Idaṃ vatvā nisīdiṃsu katvā te purato tato;
anya-e1207n:1266: Tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā “na maṃ vandanti ñātayo;
anya-e1207n:1282: Bhūsite’kāsi te sabbe sākiya’ akaruṃ tathā.
anya-e1207n:1317: “Sakyapuṅgava te ne’sa vaṃso mā cara mā cara;
anya-e1207n:1318: Vaṃse putte’karājā’pi na piṇḍāya carī pure.”
anya-e1207n:1342: Ahampa’jja na gaccheyyaṃ save bimbāya mandiraṃ.
anya-e1207n:1351: Pakampitā hemalatā’va bimbā bimbadharā satthu samīpa’māga.
anya-e1207n:1356: Rājā satthu pavedesi bimbāyā’ti bahuṃ guṇaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1368: “Sukhā’va chāyā te me”ti uggirantaṃ giraṃ piyaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1369: “Dāyajjaṃ me dadāhī’ti dāyajjaṃ me dadāhi ca”.
anya-e1207n:1400: Gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ dhammaṃ suṇitvā vimalaṃ varaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1410: Vihāre pavare datvā kārāpetvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1207n:1430: Citraṃ gandhakuṭiṃ varaṃ suvipulaṃ kāresi bhūsekharaṃ.
anya-e1207n:1453: Dūtaṃ pāhesi so satthā sutvā dūtassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e1207n:1459: Kumārā purato satthu nikkhamiṃsu surā yathā.
anya-e1207n:1496: Iti vipulayaso so tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā,
anya-e1207n:1614: Citaṃ yaṃ racayantena jinassa caritaṃ mayā;
anya-e1207n:1618: Tena saddhiṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ vindanto mahatiṃ siriṃ.
anya-e1207n:1629: Vyākato tena buddho yaṃ hessatīti anāgate;
anya-e1207n:1632: Saṃsāre saṃsaranto hi kapparukkho ca pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e1207n:1642: Mocayitvā varaṃ khemaṃ pāpuṇyeṃ sivaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e1207n:1651: Therena racitaṃ etaṃ sabbha saṃsevitaṃ sadā.
